venue.name: Villa Victoria's Jorge Hernandez Cultural Center

item.description:
As I mentioned on the discussion board, the Club Cubanos Grand Opening is tomorrow.  There won't be a meetup host this time around, but if anyone wants to go together, you can RSVP here.

Event Details:

This summer, Masacote will be teaming up with Villa Victoria, New England's largest and most significant Latino Cultural Center, to bring you a new Saturday night of Cuban music, dance, and culture!

Join us for the GRAND OPENING featuring....

Live Band: Joel Masacote y Ritmo Masacote

Guest DJ: DJ Asho (Ariel Fernandez Diaz) from NYC & Washington, DC

8:00-8:45pm Beginner & Intermediate NY Style Salsa On 2 Classes with Masacote

9:00-9:45pm Cuban Casino Rueda Classes ALL LEVELS On 1 with Amanda Gill of DC Casineros

10:00-2:00am Live Music & Dancing

$15 Cover
Book Exlusive VIP Area Online
21+

Location: Villa Victoria Center for the Arts; 85 W. Newton St.; Boston, MA 02118

View Club Cubanos Website:
www.CubanosBoston.com

 

Stay up to Date on our Facebook Page:
http://www.facebook.com/cl​ubcubanos

Bi-weekly live bands! Featuring bands like: Joel Masacote y Ritmo Masacote, Mango Blue, La Clave Secreta, La Timbistica, Obbini Tumbao, Manolo's Curubande

Our Mission: To provide a strong foundation and appreciation for live Cuban music and bridge the gap between the music & dance communities!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Dance at Club Cubanos!
